name: Rocky Roads
description:
Howdy, player!  This is simple game. You are driving in your trusty 80-s sedan, along a winding highway, past misty mountains and the greenest fields with grain.

Here you can:

  1. Chill out and listen to country music in a radio
  2. Crush the grain fields via you car
  3. Drive a car

Controls:
esc - pause menu
v - change camera view
b - back view
wasd - controls
space - brake
r - radio on/off
t - previous track
y - next track

List of radio tracks:

  1. Chris Haugen - Tumbleweed Texas
  2. Chris Haugen - Firefly
  3. Chris Haugen - Campfire Song
  4. Chris Haugen - Tupelo Train
  5. Chris Haugen - Way Out West
  6. Silent Partner - Cross the Road
  7. Everet Almond - Double Agent
  8. Bird Creek - Hooky with Sloane
  9. JR Tundra - Moonshine Town
  10. Kevin Macleod - Drankin Song
  11. Everet Almond - Oh My Love
  12. Silent Partner - Yard Sale

Game models:
Car - https://sketchfab.com/3d-models/80s-generic-midsize-sedan-low-poly-model-e2678da...

Menu music: Silent Partner - Cross the Road

Donate: buymeacoffee.com/InnokentiyG7 or in itch.io
